title: Franz Raschid
text:
Franz Raschid (18 October 1954 – 22 October 2010) was a German professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and <a href="coach%20%28sport%29">manager</a>.
Career.
Raschid, who played as a <a href="Midfielder">left midfielder</a>, spent his entire professional career with <a href="KFC%20Uerdingen%2005">Bayer Uerdingen</a>, scoring 51 goals in 364 League appearances. He later became a football manager, taking control of <a href="Arminia%20Bielefeld">Arminia Bielefeld</a> between 1990 and 1991.
Death.
Raschid died on 22 October 2010, aged 56, from <a href="pancreas%20cancer">pancreatic cancer</a>.
